author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mason Resources Reports First Quarter Net Loss Of $0.3 Mln
text:
May 11 (Reuters) - Mason Resources Corp:
* MASON RESOURCES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * MASON RESOURCES CORP - NET LOSS FOR Q1 2018 WAS $0.3 MILLION, WHICH WAS A REDUCTION OF 57% FROM THE COMPARATIVE PERIOD OF 2017
* MASON RESOURCES CORP - EXPECTS TO SPEND BETWEEN $1.2 MILLION AND $1.4 MILLION FOR THE 2018 YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
